title.value: Повышение эффективности производства молока на основе совершенствования структуры рационов кормления коров
Increase of milk production efficiency upon development of cattle feeding rations' structure
Increase of milk production efficiency upon development of cattle feeding rations' structure

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Radko, M.M., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Dairy industry appears one of the most important economic sectors of the Republic of Belarus, occupying more than 45% of total salable livestock products and about 30% of gross agricultural product. The priority directions of the development of the state, determined by Governmental program, suppose further intensification of the dairy industry with increase of annual milk production up to 10 million tons.  Development of the milk-producing branch directly depends on realization of the complex of measures, influencing the competitiveness of the milk production due to decline of production expenses. The article analyzes the problem of the improvement of the quality of balanced feeds and application of innovative (resource saving) technologies in dairy cattle breeding that brings about the increase of productivity of the branch and reduces the running costs of the economic sector. Upon the example of a dairy enterprise 'Klenovichy' evaluation of the use of additional feeds in dairy cattle's rations is made; financial results of the production and disposal of milk are analyzed.
